steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1qo9s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f3t71","text":"For human islets:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3sr25","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8kuj8","text":"Pick human islets of similar size and shape into Human Islet Culture Media until as close as possible to 100% purity.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6phpj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a6p58","text":"Human Islet Culture Media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ckgit","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1huq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8315l","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eq828","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["218","159"],"data":[["500mL DMEM (5mM glucose)","Gibco 11885"],["50 mL FBS Canadian Origin","Gibco 12483-020"],["5 mL Penicillin- Streptomycin","Gibco 15140-122"]],"guid":"09C7F530ADB411EBBDD91750695FCBBF","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["500mL DMEM (5mM glucose)","Gibco 11885"],["50 mL FBS Canadian Origin","Gibco 12483-020"],["5 mL Penicillin- Streptomycin","Gibco 15140-122"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1iath","text":"For human and mouse islets:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ub6n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9osrr","text":"Culture islets, up to 250 islets in 2 mL of media, in a 35mm non-treated culture dish, overnight in incubator at 37°C, 5% CO2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a8ic9","text":"Set up the chambers and perifusion machine according to Biorep instructions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"f4nh6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ep1pt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"d7i4h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5sbaj","text":"Set the protocol with glucose and experimental conditions (high KCl, inhibitors etc) and frequency of collection as needed using a flow rate of 100 μL/min for all steps. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b974e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9nilv","text":"Set step 1 of the perifusion protocol to total 30 min. The number of replicates will vary based on number of lanes and plate orientation. This is a pre-incubation step that should fill one 96 well plate. The perfusate from this step will be discarded.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7aeem","text":"Load islets into each chamber. The number of islets will vary by experiment and sensitivity of ELISA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3dil5","text":"Run a 30 min pre-incubation as previously set (step 1 of perifusion machine protocol) and discard the perfusate. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bu5i5","text":"Continue to run the perifusion protocol, collecting samples into a clean deep well plate(s). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bs359","text":"Upon completion of perifusion protocol, seal the place deep well plates at store at   until ELISA . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":84,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7go4c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"be91s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"2DF34470ADB711EBBDD91750695FCBBF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b7gpb","text":"To collect insulin content, run the chambers dry, so islets are on the filter paper but no liquid remains. Place the filter paper with islets into a 1.5 mL tube with 500 μL of acid ethanol. Store at   until ELISA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":199,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"djlaa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"6A5E2FB0ADB711EBBDD91750695FCBBF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"46le9","text":"Samples are assayed for Insulin using Alpco Stellux human or mouse insulin ELISA. Vortex insulin content samples and dilute 1:400 prior to assay. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
